channel.title: How do i host wthout portforwarding?
channel.description:
i have tried µTorrent but when i click run it says 'server already in use'.
i cannot portforward because when i do i have no internet access
if anybody can host that would be great - just email dazalscape@gmail.com
thanks, Dazal

item.title: How do i host wthout portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You can’t run uTorrent and a server with 43594 as both use the same port, you must either change your server port to 5555 or whatever your choice, or else change uTorrent’s port.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i host wthout portforwarding?

item.title: How do i host wthout portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Dev Dark_Dev
item.description:
@Dark_Dev wrote:

T[quote=“Dazal2000, post:1, topic:255729”]i have tried µTorrent but when i click run it says ‘server already in use’.

i cannot portforward because when i do i have no internet access

if anybody can host that would be great - just email dazalscape@gmail.com

thanks, Dazal[/quote]

I can’t port forward either. If your happy with your server being ready for the public to play on then maybe you should consider buying a cheap VPS. A VPS with 512MB ram can handle 40-50 players quite well and would cost around $20-$30 a month. Atleast that way your server will be 24-7 uptime, minimal lag and you wont have to port forward.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i host wthout portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @CarScape CarScape
item.description:
@CarScape wrote:

port forwarding is easy go your ip adress do pass Admin user name Admin
then go advances or something like that search for vitrual server and press there will be Add opition press on it
Do User defined w/e and put all ports 43594 and do option TCP/UDP

From Internet Host IP Address: ALL
Forward to Internal Host IP Address: [ your ip adress]

finished …
